fr.iut.tapawaru.action

Class Attack

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iut.tapawaru.action.Action
      • fr.iut.tapawaru.action.Spell
        • fr.iut.tapawaru.action.Attack

  • public class Attack
extends Spell
    Attack spells. Library gathering static methods of the different attack spells. Inherited class from Spell, likewise Terra spells.
